title: Quantum Expands Its Market With New Myriad All-Flash File & Object Solution
description: Quantum Corporation jumped head-first into the scale-out file and object storage market earlier this month with the announcement of its new Quantum Myriad all-flash storage solution.

title: See A New Planet Being Born While Buried In Dust 350 Light-Years Away
description: The SPHERE instrument on ESO's Very Large Telescope has revealed only the third planet caught in the act of formation around the star HD 169142.

title: The Real Problem With TikTok Is Not The Algorithm. It’s All Of Us
description: There’s no question this tracking is what makes the app so addictive and powerful.

title: Digital Transformation In Supply Chain Management
description: APQC conducts research on supply chain and logistics to help organizations assess the performance of their own processes and functions compared to their peers. Most recently, the APQC has conducted best practice and benchmarking research on digital transformation.

title: Dogs Are Humans’ Best Friends: Could We Reduce Their Carbon Footprint?
description: Dogs are humans’ best friends. The rising pet population and the popularity of meat-based diets raise climate concerns. If household pets were a country, they would rank 5th in meat consumption. To support pet ownership but lower their carbon footprint, reducing meat in diets is a first step.

title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Will Have Dazzling New Look, Leak Claims
description: A fresh leak promises a new look for the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max: here’s what it really means.

title: Covid-19 During Pregnancy Linked To Severe Brain Damage In 2 Infants
description: If you are wondering what could possibly go wrong with getting Covid-19 while you are pregnant, a pair of case reports just published in Pediatrics has provided some more answers.

title: Tesla To Build New Battery Factory In China: Report
description: Tesla plans to build a new factory in Shanghai, China, according to a report from Chinese state media outlet Xinhua. The factory will produce Tesla’s large storage battery, called the Megapack.

title: Can Heartbreak Music Help You Move Past A Breakup? A Psychologist Weighs In
description: Pop music is designed to make you feel a certain way, but can it cause more harm than good?

title: The Unexpected Contribution Of Medieval Monks To Volcanology
description: By observing the Moon's coloration during a lunar eclipse, medieval monks unwittingly recorded some of history's largest volcanic eruptions.

title: Roland’s AeroCaster Is An Affordable TV Studio Using Your iPhones
description: Add video to your podcast or capture your band's live performances with up to four cameras. The Roland AeroCaster VCR-01 uses iOS or Android devices as cameras using Wi-Fi to connect. This useful little gadget also makes for a great three channel podcasting mixer.

title: Top 5 AI Risks In The Era Of ChatGPT and Generative AI
description: For corporate boards and management teams who have not yet developed an AI risk management plan, ChatGPT should be a stunning wake-up call.

title: Astronomers Blown Away By New NASA Webb Images Of ‘Cassiopeia A’ Supernova Remnant
description: Astounding new Webb Space Telescope images of supernova remnant Cassiopeia A may finally help astronomers understand how supernovae generate life’s biomolecular precursors.

title: How Inclusive Language Can Increase Food Security
description: As National Public Health Week draws to a close, there have been conversations about taking strides toward better food choices. The theme for this year, Centering and Celebrating Cultures in Health, is particularly befitting because of the impact of food insecurity on society.

title: Top Secret Pentagon Documents Were Leaked To Online Forum About Minecraft: Report
description: The Pentagon has been trying to figure out how highly classified documents were leaked online, according to new reports from the New York Times and Washington Post. But the websites where these Top Secret military documents were leaked is making the mystery even weirder.

title: David Crosby Died While Battling Covid-19, Per Graham Nash
description: According to Nash, Crosby had contracted the Covid-19 coronavirus a second time.

title: Today’s Wordle #659 Hints, Clues And Answer For Sunday April 9th
description: Hints, clues and everything you need to solve today's Wordle and keep your streak intact.

title: Minnesota Man Sentenced To 2 Years In Prison For Aiming Laser At Plane
description: A Minnesota man was sentenced this week to two years in prison for aiming a laser at a Delta Air Lines flight flying to Minneapolis, according to a press release by the U.S. Attorney’s Office for the Western District of Wisconsin.

title: Iran Installs Cameras For Morality Police To Identify Women Defying Hijab Law
description: Police in Iran have installed new cameras in public places to identify women who are breaking the law by not wearing a hijab, according to a new report from Al Jazeera.

title: Today’s ‘Heardle’ Answer And Clues For Sunday, April 9
description: Here's today's 'Heardle' song, along with some hints.

title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX Is About To Launch ‘Starship’ Into Orbit Around Earth
description: SpaceX could be on the cusp of its first attempt to launch its Starship spacecraft into orbit around Earth.
